name: Fragments of time
description:
Abstract light painting created with steel wool on fire in pitch darkness. It was complemented by digital art.


This piece is part of a colorful series of mine (Revival, 2017). 

-

Longa exposição abstrata, pintada com lã de aço em chamas, feita no completo escuro. Terminei de finalizá-la através da arte digital.

Esta arte é parte de um projeto colorido meu (Revival, 2017).

*

Original artwork by @carolinabragaferreira/@artcarolinabf


Brazil, 2021
